results.name: Inverse binomial transform of A140962.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-3).
formula: G.f.: x^2/( Q(0)+ 2*x)- x where Q(k) =  1 - x/(x*(k+1) - 1 )/Q(k+1) ; (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Feb 24 2013
a(n) = (-3)^(n-2) for n >= 2, with a(0) = 0 and a(1) = -1. - _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 30 2021
program: (Sage) [-n if n<2 else (-3)^(n-2) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 30 2021
xref: Cf. A285066 (alternating row sums, starting here with n >= 2). - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 23 2017
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 04 2008
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 11 2008
